repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.7
MAINTAINER Alexandre Ferland <aferlandqc@gmail.com>

RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

COPY requirements.txt /usr/src/app/
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

COPY . /usr/src/app

EXPOSE 5000

CMD ["python", "run.py"]
